WorkItem.Summary: Navigate to other page with parameters

Comments.Message: I'd also like to see something related to Navigation. In particular something to ease ViewModel navigation, display dialogs etc.

I currently work around this issue using my IoC container. From View A, I get a reference to the singleton instance of View B's ViewModel. From there, I make what are, in essence, global property changes, then I navigate to B.

So, it looks like this:

IoC -(registers)-> ViewModelB [singleton]ViewA -(loads)-> ViewModelBViewA -(changes)-> ViewModelB ViewA -(navigates to)-> ViewBViewB -(displays)-> ViewModelB
